documents.document: Love these guys. They hang out in my mum and dad's backyard #kingparrot https://t.co/eYHj6HvcrT

In 1950, the Australian Govt tried to ban the Communist Party. The High Court declared it unconstitutional. Long live the rule of law.
People are radicalised when they feel marginalised, unwanted, unfairly treated. Terrorist ideologies flourish. Borders are meaningless.

@underwaterone @AusRepublic Not sure a bill of rights would fix that! Anyway, I'm not anti BoR, just think we need to have an eye to future
@underwaterone @AusRepublic Agree. But conscious that values change. what protects us today could prevent positive change in future
@underwaterone @AusRepublic It's a double edged sword. the US has right to bear arms. Perhaps we need to just elect the right politicians!
@Ukurrie @underwaterone I should hope not!
@underwaterone @AusRepublic I reckon we've done pretty well without a Bill of Rights over the years - allows for flexible interpretation!
@underwaterone @AusRepublic Fair point Lisa. But I'd still rather an Australian who lives in & represents our country than a foreign royal!
